leadership.description: This is a course that will reveal your ability to influence others, inspire and lead a team

business.description: Will give you the opportunity to highlight the commercial spirit in you, direct potential into the development and monetization of your own idea for the purpose of making a profit

politicalScienceSociology.description: Will help you deepen your understanding of political phenomena and social processes, as well as their interaction and impact on society

innovativeTechnologies.description: Allows you to learn about new advanced methods used to improve or create new products, services or processes, contributing to technological progress and improved results

art.description: You will be able to understand the heritage of human creativity, connect with the beautiful and create something even greater, your ideas will have a place in implementation

careerCounselin.description: This important component will definitely come in handy when choosing a profession, the consultant will help you find out your interests and goals, plan your career, develop a strategy for self-improvement, prepare you for entering the labor market, teach you how to manage your career

profTest.question: Is it difficult to decide on a course?
profTest.answer: Take our special test and find out which areas of professional development will suit you

Partners.title: Hey folks, look at the incredible partners working with Mindlab!
Partners.question: Do you want to get to know them better?
Partners.partnersList: Mushroom Academy, Kyiv metropolitan educational institution named, Kyiv Children's Academy, Ukranian Cosmic Education.
Partners.text: We have something to be proud of, because our partners have become:

patrners1.title: Mushroom Academy
patrners1.description: Mushroom Academy is a Western Ukrainian IT school. For more than 19 years, he has been helping Ukrainians to build a successful career in the digital economy: he educates the next generation of IT citizens, develops the IT cluster, and helps those who need it.

patrners2.title: Kyiv metropolitan educational institution named
patrners2.description: The mission of our institution is to help everyone in integral development and leadership formation, to serve the person, community, and society. Quality training, innovative curricula and high-level research are our priorities.

patrners3.title: Kyiv Children's Academy
patrners3.description: The Kyiv Children's Academy is a leader in extracurricular education in Ukraine, a platform for testing and implementing innovations, and contributes to the development of scientific education in the Eastern European region. We teach you to make discoveries and create your future!

patrners4.title: Ukranian Cosmic Education
patrners4.description: Ukranian Cosmic Education is an educational space that influences changes in Ukrainian society. Helps students find their place in the world by inspiring them to personal growth, academic achievement and leadership for the common good. Ukranian Cosmic Education is an educational space that influences changes in Ukrainian society.

Parents.title: Information for parents
Parents.information: Dear parents, if you have any questions about the courses, the platform, MindLab activities, contact us in the chat or by mail.

platform.name: Platform
platform.description: The educational and social platform MindLab Hub for teenagers and young adults is an innovative and safe center created for development, learning and interaction. We strive to provide the young and gifted generation with the opportunity to gain knowledge, gather inspiration, find their own path in life and plan their career. These components will allow to support motivated young people - future leaders who will contribute to the development of Ukraine.
platform.inforvation: We introduce young people to the following areas: Leadership, business, political science and sociology, modern technologies, art, career counseling, career support, which help students expand their knowledge and skills.

spiker.name: Speakers and mentors
spiker.description: The platform provides an opportunity to listen to lectures and receive advice from well-known specialists in various fields. Interactive webinars and interviews with successful personalities inspire and help students understand their capabilities.
spiker.inforvation: We introduce young people to the following areas: Leadership, business, political science and sociology, modern technologies, art, career counseling, career support, which help students expand their knowledge and skills.

guidanc.name: Career guidanc
guidanc.description: The offered career guidance tools help to determine one's own strengths and weaknesses, reveal possible career paths and help in choosing a future profession.

counseling.name: Career Counseling
counseling.description: On the platform, there is an opportunity to receive advice from professional career consultants who will help determine a career development strategy and draw up a plan to achieve the set goals. Consultants represent a galaxy of successful businessmen, politicians, well-known personalities in various spheres of activity.

comunication.name: Communication
comunication.description: The platform can become a platform for communication between teenagers, students, teachers, mentors, MindLab Hub creates a space for virtual communication, exchange of ideas and experiences between participants. This helps to form friendships, exchange knowledge and support.
comunication.inforvation: We help students build a network of connections, in particular with university representatives. With the help of our platform, users will be able to make educational choices, discuss study details and get advice from students and graduates. Our platform aims to be a virtual partner in development and self-improvement for every teenager, providing tools and resources for their future success.
